title: Wild Wonders @ Bird Paradise Adventure
blurb: Feathered Mystery Adventure at Bird Paradise awaits!
description: Unleash your child’s inner wildlife detective as they hunt clues, meet amazing birds, and discover surprising connections between birds and humans - all in a fun, interactive game at Bird Paradise! This family-friendly adventure encourages exploration and learning about the avian world. Children will engage in activities that promote observation skills and problem-solving. The experience is designed to be both educational and entertaining, making it a memorable outing for families. Discover the wonders of birds and their relationship with humans through this interactive adventure.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Adventure
blurb: Hunt clues, meet birds, discover connections!
description: Unleash your child’s inner wildlife detective as they hunt clues, meet amazing birds, and discover surprising connections between birds and humans - all in a fun, interactive game at Bird Paradise! This engaging activity is perfect for families and children who love animals and enjoy solving mysteries. Explore the wonders of the avian world through interactive games and encounters with fascinating bird species. Discover the surprising ways birds and humans are connected in this educational and entertaining experience. Suitable for children aged 5 and above, this adventure promises a memorable day of learning and fun.

title: Wild Wonders @ Bird Paradise Programme Package
blurb: Explore Bird Paradise with our exclusive Wild Wonders package.
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure at Bird Paradise with our Wild Wonders programme. This package offers a unique opportunity to discover the wonders of avian life through engaging activities and interactive experiences. Perfect for families and bird enthusiasts of all ages, this programme provides an in-depth look at the diverse species and habitats within the park. Enjoy guided tours, educational talks, and hands-on encounters that will deepen your appreciation for the natural world. The Wild Wonders package is designed to create lasting memories and inspire a lifelong love for birds and conservation. Suitable for children and adults alike, this experience promises fun and learning for the whole family. Discover the beauty and importance of our feathered friends in a captivating and educational setting.

title: Bird Paradise: Wildlife and Human Challenges Program
blurb: Discover wildlife challenges through game-based learning.
description: This program allows participants to discover that wildlife and humans face similar environmental and health challenges. Build observation, inference, and reasoning skills through game-based learning. Develop empathy through animal rescue stories and social-emotional prompts. Strengthen communication, teamwork, and decision-making abilities. Gain foundational knowledge about bird traits – habitat, diet, behaviour, and physical features. This educational experience is designed to be family-friendly and engaging for children and adults alike, fostering a deeper understanding of the natural world and the importance of conservation efforts.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Team Activities
blurb: Team activities build confidence, empathy, and thinking.
description: Dynamic team-based activities designed to boost confidence, foster empathy, and sharpen critical thinking skills through collaboration, problem-solving, and meaningful group interaction. The activities encourage children to explore the world more deeply, look closely at what they see, think about what it means, and ask curious questions, all while building great thinking and wondering skills! Perfect for families and children looking to enhance their teamwork and critical thinking abilities in a fun and engaging environment.

title: Explore the World with “See, Think, Wonder” Skills
blurb: Deepen curiosity with “See, Think, Wonder” learning.
description: Engage children in a fun and easy way to explore the world more deeply. This routine helps children slow down, look closely at what they see, think about what it means, and ask curious questions—all while building great thinking and wondering skills! A meaningful debrief and take-home activity to continue the learning journey. A thoughtful wrap-up and fun take-home case file that helps learners reflect on what they’ve discovered and keep the learning going beyond the session. This activity is family-friendly and suitable for children of all ages who are curious and eager to learn.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Learning Journey
blurb: Interactive learning with scavenger hunt and clue games.
description: Embark on an engaging adventure at Bird Paradise, where children solve riddles and uncover hidden clues to discover the final mystery bird. This program encourages team play, critical thinking, and loads of fun. A meaningful debrief and take-home activity will continue the learning journey beyond the session, helping learners reflect on what they’ve discovered. Perfect for families and children interested in birds and wildlife.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Interactive Game
blurb: Solve riddles, uncover clues, and find the mystery bird!
description: Embark on an engaging adventure where children solve riddles and uncover hidden clues, bringing them closer to the final mystery bird. This activity is perfect for encouraging team play and critical thinking, while providing loads of fun. Meet the rare and remarkable birds of Mandai! Each bird has a unique story of survival, rescue, and conservation, representing hope for threatened species worldwide. This family-friendly activity is designed to be both educational and entertaining, suitable for children who enjoy puzzles and learning about wildlife.

title: Bird Paradise: Real-life Bird Heroes of Mandai
blurb: Meet rare birds with stories of survival and rescue.
description: Discover the remarkable birds of Mandai, each with a unique story of survival, rescue, and conservation, representing hope for threatened species worldwide. Engage in dynamic team-based activities designed to boost confidence, foster empathy, and sharpen critical thinking skills through collaboration, problem-solving, and meaningful group interaction. Perfect for families and children interested in learning about wildlife conservation and the importance of protecting endangered species. Explore the diverse habitats and learn about the challenges these birds face in the wild. A fun and educational experience for all ages.

title: See, Think, Wonder Learning at Bird Paradise
blurb: Explore the world more deeply with curiosity skills.
description: “See, Think, Wonder” is a fun and easy way to explore the world more deeply. It helps children slow down, look closely at what they see, think about what it means, and ask curious questions—all while building great thinking and wondering skills! This routine encourages children to observe their surroundings with intention, fostering a sense of curiosity and wonder. By engaging in this process, children develop critical thinking skills and learn to appreciate the world around them in new and meaningful ways. It is suitable for families and children of all ages.

title: Explore the World with "See, Think, Wonder" Skills
blurb: Deepen curiosity with "See, Think, Wonder" learning routine.
description: "See, Think, Wonder" is a fun and easy way to explore the world more deeply. It helps children slow down, look closely at what they see, think about what it means, and ask curious questions—all while building great thinking and wondering skills! A meaningful debrief and take-home activity to continue the learning journey. A thoughtful wrap-up and fun take-home case file that helps learners reflect on what they’ve discovered and keep the learning going beyond the session. This activity encourages children to observe, think critically, and ask questions, fostering a deeper understanding and appreciation for the world around them. It's designed to be engaging and educational, promoting curiosity and lifelong learning.

title: Meet the Bird Heroes at Mandai's Bird Paradise
blurb: Discover rare birds' survival, rescue, conservation stories!
description: Meet the rare and remarkable birds of Mandai at Bird Paradise! Each bird has a unique story of survival, rescue, and conservation, representing hope for threatened species worldwide. Learn about their habitats, behaviors, and the efforts to protect them. This is a great opportunity for families to connect with nature and understand the importance of conservation. Perfect for children and adults alike, this experience offers an educational and inspiring look at the world of birds. Join us and discover the real-life bird heroes of Mandai, and their unique stories of survival and conservation.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Adventure Awaits
blurb: Embark on an epic scavenger hunt for clues!
description: Join us for Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise! This exciting program includes a mission briefing, warm-up challenges, and an epic scavenger hunt for clues at Winged Sanctuary. Participants will engage in investigative strategies, mystery-solving interrogations, and a feathered mystery seek-and-solve activity. Perfect for families and children who love adventure and solving puzzles. Conclude with reflection and closing the case. An engaging and educational experience awaits!

title: Wild Wonders of Bird Paradise Programme Details
blurb: Explore the wonders of Bird Paradise with our programme.
description: Discover the wonders of Bird Paradise through our engaging programme. Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of birds and learn about their unique adaptations and behaviors. This family-friendly programme offers a variety of activities suitable for all ages, including interactive exhibits, guided tours, and educational presentations. Explore diverse habitats, from lush rainforests to serene wetlands, and encounter fascinating bird species from around the globe. Our knowledgeable guides will share captivating stories and insights, enhancing your understanding of avian life and conservation efforts. Join us for an unforgettable adventure that celebrates the beauty and importance of birds in our ecosystem. Perfect for families and bird enthusiasts of all ages.

title: Wild Wonders Bird Paradise Programme at ZooSchool
blurb: Explore the wonders of Bird Paradise with ZooSchool!
description: Embark on an educational adventure at Bird Paradise with the Wild Wonders programme by ZooSchool. This programme offers children the opportunity to discover the fascinating world of birds through engaging activities and interactive learning experiences. Please note that park admission is not included in the programme fee and must be purchased separately. Meals are not provided, so pack some snacks to keep the energy up. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, there may be slight variations to the camp activities. To ensure the health and safety of all children and staff at ZooSchool, we kindly ask parents to inform us immediately if their child or any household member is recovering from a contagious illness. Instructors reserve the right to refuse participation to any child who appears visibly unwell on the day of camp.
datetime_display: Please refer to the programme outline for details.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Programme Venue
blurb: Explore Bird Paradise with engaging activities and fun.
description: Embark on an exciting journey at Bird Paradise with our Wild Wonders programme! Designed for families and children, this immersive experience offers a unique opportunity to discover the fascinating world of birds through interactive activities and educational encounters. Explore diverse avian species, learn about their habitats, and participate in hands-on workshops that foster a deeper appreciation for wildlife conservation. Perfect for kids aged 5-12, this programme promises an unforgettable adventure filled with fun and learning. Parents are encouraged to join in the exploration and create lasting memories together. Discover the wonders of Bird Paradise and inspire a lifelong love for nature in your little ones.

title: Bird Paradise Wild Wonders Programme at Mandai Zoo
blurb: Explore the wonders of Bird Paradise with activities.
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure at Bird Paradise with the Wild Wonders Programme! This immersive experience is designed for families and children who are eager to discover the fascinating world of birds. While meals are not provided, feel free to bring your own tasty snacks to keep your energy levels high throughout the day. The programme includes a variety of engaging activities that will bring you up close and personal with a diverse range of avian species. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, there may be slight variations to the camp activities. This programme is perfect for families looking for a fun and educational outing.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise Programme
blurb: Discover the wonders of Bird Paradise!
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey into the avian world with Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise. This immersive programme offers a unique opportunity to explore the diverse habitats and fascinating behaviours of over 3,500 birds from 400 species. Engage in interactive exhibits, captivating shows, and educational talks led by expert keepers. Discover the secrets of these feathered creatures and learn about conservation efforts to protect them in the wild. Perfect for families and bird enthusiasts of all ages, Wild Wonders promises an enriching and memorable experience that will deepen your appreciation for the beauty and importance of avian biodiversity. Explore the various themed zones, including the Penguin Cove, Waterfall Aviary, and Lory Loft, each showcasing unique bird species and ecosystems. Participate in daily feeding sessions and get up close with these amazing animals. Wild Wonders is an adventure for the whole family.

title: Bird Paradise Park Admission at Mandai Wildlife
blurb: Explore the wonders of Bird Paradise.
description: Discover a world of avian wonders at Bird Paradise, home to a stunning array of bird species from around the globe. Immerse yourself in vibrant habitats, witness captivating bird shows, and learn about conservation efforts. Perfect for families and bird enthusiasts of all ages, Bird Paradise offers an unforgettable experience filled with beauty, education, and appreciation for the natural world. Explore diverse aviaries, encounter rare and exotic birds, and create lasting memories in this captivating sanctuary. Enjoy interactive exhibits, educational programs, and breathtaking displays that showcase the incredible diversity of avian life. A family-friendly destination that inspires a love for nature and a commitment to conservation.

title: Wild Wonders at Bird Paradise
blurb: Discover the wonders of Bird Paradise!
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey into the avian world at Bird Paradise. Explore diverse habitats, witness captivating bird shows, and learn about conservation efforts. Perfect for families and bird enthusiasts of all ages, this immersive experience offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature and marvel at the beauty of our feathered friends. Discover the vibrant colours and fascinating behaviours of over 3,500 birds from 400 species in this stunning sanctuary. Engage in interactive exhibits and educational programs designed to inspire a love for wildlife and promote environmental stewardship. A must-visit destination for a fun and educational day out.

title: Wild Wonders of Bird Paradise Programme
blurb: Explore the wonders of Bird Paradise with our programme.
description: Embark on an educational adventure at Bird Paradise! This programme offers a unique opportunity for families and children to discover the diverse avian species and their habitats. Engage in interactive activities, learn about conservation efforts, and create lasting memories. Perfect for kids aged 5-12, this experience combines fun with learning, fostering a deeper appreciation for the natural world. Explore the various zones within Bird Paradise, each showcasing different bird species and ecosystems. Participate in guided tours, hands-on workshops, and captivating presentations. This family-friendly programme is designed to inspire and educate, making it an unforgettable experience for all.
